alert.note: Alert for Bent County Including Las Animas; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 12 at 3:40AM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 229, 230, 232, 233, AND 235... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228, 229, 230, 232, 233 and 235. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bent County Including Las Animas; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
